Huh, this has potential. Could add minigames for potential science bonuses?

"Zap the rock with your laser", made like a phone darts game.

Mixing various goos together to see what happens? You might get a bonus, you might get an explosion (which in kerbal-land is just a bonus of a different sort).

A "deduce the numbers" Mastermind game. Like the one you use in Terran Conflict to hack into the #deca vessel. The less turns you take, the more of a science multiplier from a computationally-heavy experiment of some sorts.

I'm sure people can think of more really-simple examples!
